hero.title: Aviation Consulting
hero.subtitle: that Delivers Trust
hero.description: Trusted by airlines and leasing companies worldwide, I reduce operational risk, secure 100% compliance.
hero.multiPlatform: Expertise Across Airbus, Boeing, Embraer, ATR & Fokker

about.title: Why Choose Me
about.description1: I help airlines and lessors protect asset value with specialized expertise in commercial aircraft maintenance, redelivery, and technical consultancy. My work focuses on measurable outcomes: lower risk, faster transitions, and approved documentation.
about.description2: Experience across Airbus, Boeing, Embraer, ATR, and Fokker. I deliver comprehensive lessor inspections, records audits, and physical condition reviews that ensure airworthiness and regulatory approval.

deliveryAuditor.title: Delivery Document Auditor
deliveryAuditor.description: Led records audits (ADs, SBs, APU) on E195 aircraft, enabling smooth acceptance and full regulatory compliance.

lessorRep.title: Lessor Representative
lessorRep.description: Directed comprehensive redelivery inspection and records audit for E195, exceeding lessor requirements.

northCompass.title: Lessor Representative
northCompass.description: Delivered B737-800 redelivery project, including OCCM and HT documentation audits.

pcaAirworthiness.title: Project Manager / Auditor
pcaAirworthiness.description: Managed B737-700 redelivery and performed delivery inspections/audits on A320 family aircraft and CFM56 engines.

engineer.title: Engineer
engineer.description: Planned and executed heavy checks and redeliveries (A320/A330), coordinating returns to major lessors (e.g., GECAS, JSA, MCAP, McLarens, ACG).

systemsEngineer.title: Systems Engineer
systemsEngineer.description: Managed MEL and maintenance programs across types, served as OEM liaison, approved PMA materials, and integrated ATR-42 into fleet.

redelivery.title: Redelivery & Leasing Solutions
redelivery.description: Lessor inspections, records audits, OCCM/HT compliance, AD/SB management, physical condition review

certifications.title: Certification & Compliance
certifications.description: MEL optimization, maintenance program development, PMA parts approval processes

systems.title: Systems Engineering
systems.description: Technical liaison with OEMs, fleet integration strategies, maintenance planning optimization

contact.title: Request a Consultation
contact.description: Let's discuss your aircraft redelivery, compliance, or technical operations challenges. Available for consultancy, redelivery projects, and technical advisory.
contact.whatsappMessage: Hello! I saw your portfolio and would like to discuss professional opportunities.

mission.title: Company Mission
items: Deliver the best service at a fair price in the shortest possible time, avoiding additional costs
Ensure the quality of the service to be delivered and maintain the highest level of available information regarding all aspects of the work performed
Be fully transparent regarding the implicit expenses involved in the service to be provided
Maintain total availability and flexibility to meet needs wherever and whenever necessary

gallery.description: Images from actual inspections, audits, and maintenance environments across major commercial platforms.

nightOperations.title: Latam A320 - Mid lease inspection
nightOperations.description: Modern cockpit systems and instrumentation during night operations

cockpitSystems.title: Cockpit Systems
cockpitSystems.description: Modern avionics and flight management systems

experienceCard.title: 20+ Years of Delivering Results
experienceCard.description: Selected projects across Airbus, Boeing, Embraer, ATR, and Fokker—demonstrating compliance, documentation rigor, and on-time delivery for airlines and lessors.
